评论详情: Saw a reel online of these pants....was a lil iffy I bought a different brand & was disappointed..but these pants in the NextEpoch brand are for me a 10!  The important notes for my 5'2 midsize (Im a size 14-16 or XL/XXL in most women's items, sometimes 18-20): Pockets are on both sides & can hold small items like an iphone, chapstick, even keys - Yay! Comfort - Yay! Soft & cozy with nice stretch! Wash & wear - Held up great after 5 washes Transparency - squat and yoga tested, I didn't have any issues with see through or roll down myself. Would I repurchase? Absolutely- in every color if I could!  I bought black to start and test for about a few weeks and wear. Loved these so much, I picked up navy, dark gray, and will try out the dark olive. Going to also try out how the shorts wear (for spring/summer)!

类型: Fit Type: Full Length with PocketsSize: 3X-LargeColor: A-6#army Green
评论详情: I have bought a LOT of leggings on Amazon and I am the most impressed with these! First, they actually fit! The sizing chart was actually accurate! I’m between a size 22 and 24 in pants (22 are very tight, 24 are a little loose), and the 3X fit me perfectly. They’re snug but not tight.  They don’t roll down, even though they’re high waisted. That’s a miracle all on its own.  They are ACTUALLY buttery soft smooth, like That One Brand - except the fabric is snappier and tighter, not as loose as That One Brand. This works really well because these are definitely more of a workout style, rather than a cute/fashion style.  The seems feel good quality, and there are pockets! And they’re actually the right size for a phone. The fabric is also good quality - not thin, not thick, not warm, not cool. They’re just right.  The color is also true to the picture, a nice olive green.  I couldn’t be more pleased with these. They weren’t cheap, but they’re worth it as long as they last.

评论详情: This is my first time ordering leggings.  I am 77 years old and never imagined myself wearing such a thing. My PT instructor urged me to try leggings instead of trousers or jeans, so I went ahead and ordered this pair.  WOW, I was surprised how comfortable the fit was.  Super soft and stretchy too.  No pressure points or rubbing anywhere.  Now, 3 months past surgery and finished with Physical Therapy, I go to the Gym to keep up with the therapeutic pedaling to strengthen the muscles in my legs.  Anyway, these leggings are fantastic!  Today I ordered 2 more pair in different colors.
